name: alpinejs-devtools
description: DevTools extension for debugging Alpine.js applications.

scripts.prepare: [ -f "/opt/environment_summary.sh" ] && husky || echo 'Skipping hooks install in Jules VM'
scripts.early-access: rm -rf dist && pnpm --filter=browser-extension build && pnpm package
scripts.mainline: rm -rf dist && pnpm build && pnpm package
scripts.package: pnpm pkg:chrome && pnpm pkg:firefox && pnpm archive:v2
scripts.cy:cache:check: pnpm --filter=browser-extension exec cypress cache path && pnpm --filter=browser-extension exec cypress cache list
scripts.cy:bin:install: pnpm --filter=browser-extension exec cypress install && pnpm --filter=browser-extension exec cypress cache list
